column4: guys ...will there be Feisty Fawn DVDs at launch ? because I have a computer which pnly boots from DVDs ....
the dvd edition includes the entire main and restricted repositories
I see ...Thank you very much ...I really appreciate your help :)
sorry for my stream of questions ...but I need to know if I can burn a CD ISO on a DVD ....will it work and boot normally? Thanks in advance
haven't a clue, doubt it. Get the dvd image
but it includes the entire main and universe
I know ...but I don't usually use these so much ...anyway thanks for your precious time
May I ask a question please?

if I had a cybercafe and I want to use ubuntu (GNU/Linux in general) can I prevent the person who uses the system from downloading files and packages while maintaining a smooth web browsing experience?
you could make it so that they have no space to save anything in.
How to do that....I don't even want to allow any files (not packages ) such as images and the like to be saved through firefox? is there a simple way to do that ? and thanks
I'm not completely sure as I've never done it myself. I think there's a way to set quotas on users... sorry
Thanks :) I will do some research to discover that ...thanks for the time
